name: Users - System admin changes own password - Blank fields

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
1. Log in as system admin
  2. Open System Console > Users
  3. On own user, click drop-down and select Update password
  4. Leave fields blank
  5. Click Save, observe error "Please enter your current password."
  6. Enter old password, leave new password blank, click Save
inline.expectedResult: Error displays (text depends on server's password requirements) "Your password must contain between 5 and 64 characters."
